Row.Text: A Great Heathen Army of vikings seeking to pillage and burn our cities has been sighted within our empire! We must rally to defend our people against this incursion.[NEWLINE]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]A Great Heathen Army spawns[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive two Huscarls at your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital[ENDCOLOR]
A Great Heathen Army has invaded our empire. God save us!
The Anglo-Saxon nation has been invaded by a Great Heathen Army.

The venerable Bede has composed his greatest work: the Ecclesiastical History of the English People, which expouses the great history of the resilience of our faith. It is truly a wonder of knowledge to behold![NEWLINE]
Burn it. It will only cause trouble.
We must have it mass printed for all able men to read.
The book must be cherished; it must never be handled.
We have destroyed a great work of the venerable Bede.
We have decreed that the venerable Bede's great work will be printed en masse.
We have decreed that the venerable Bede's great work will be keep under lock and key and prevented from being handled.
The venerable Bede has completed his greatest work, the Ecclesiastical History of the English People, in the Anglo-Saxon nation.
